headline: AutoJobR: AI-Powered Job Application Automation Platform
abstract: AutoJobR is a comprehensive job application automation platform that leverages artificial intelligence to help job seekers apply to 1000+ jobs daily, optimize resumes for Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS), and secure interviews 10x faster. The platform integrates with major job boards including LinkedIn, Indeed, and 100+ others, providing automated application submission, intelligent job matching, and ATS-optimized resume generation. With over 1 million users and 10 million applications processed, AutoJobR has demonstrated an 85% success rate in helping users secure interviews within 7 days.
